shows.title: Taizé
shows.desc:
Beautiful and atmospheric Taizé-style worship at the far side of the lake, mixing the melodies and harmonies of simple Taizé chants with scripture readings, prayers and stillness as we make time and space to come before God.

Andrew and Felicity Maries lead a small group of singers and instrumentalists in Taizé-style worship especially for Greenbelt.
